name: Elder Fraud, Am I Being Scammed?
description: Almost all of us have been scammed at one time or another. It’s natural to want to put your trust in others. And scammers are experts at winning our trust. If you think you’ve been scammed, or think you’re about to be, ask yourself: - Is a stranger or “new friend” pressuring me for money? - Are they saying there’s a risk to me or my family if I don’t act right away? - Did your computer screen lock and prompt you to call a number? - Does it all just seem too good (or too bad!) to be true? Althoug
